collection:
Information We Do Not Collect

We do not collect, store, or use any personal information from our users.

Use of Your Profile

**Analysis Only:** When you use our Service to optimize your profile, the
information you provide is only used for the purpose of analysis and
generating optimization suggestions.

**No Storage:** We do not store your profile information, or any other
personal data you provide during the use of our Service.

We do not require
your name, email address, or any other personal information.
sharing: **No Sharing:** Your information is not shared with any third parties.
